c74object.name: tsah~
c74object.digest: Sample and hold on any non-zero trigger value
c74object.description: tsah~ is like sah~ but the output value is updated whenever the trigger input is non-zero (meaning the output can be updated once per sample if desired).

method.name: signal
method.description: The left inlet takes a signal to be sampled. When a tigger signal is recieved in the right inlet, the input is sampled and output as a constant signal value.

method.name: signal
method.description:
The right inlet takes a trigger signal used to determine when to sample and output the left inlet's input.
Thus for any non-zero signal in the right inlet, tsah~ will constantly output the same value as at the left inlet.

entry.name: signal
entry.description: Output sample and hold data whenever the trigger data is non-zero.
